name: Tactics Goblin
description:
Select a party of three adventurers to battle against an AI controlled opponent! 

This is just a small prototype to showcase pathfinding and decision making algorithms that I made for class as part of an 'AI for Games' unit. Inspired by my love for Fire Emblem and Final Fantasy Tactics, I figured this would be the perfect medium to showcase those concepts!

Inputs:

  • Left Mouse Button - Used to select units, tiles, or interact with buttons.
  • Escape - Use to unselect a unit (if one is selected)
